revisions.comment: Cleanup addition. Such info did not have a place in the lead
A newly published article - The wild species genome ancestry of domestic chicken https://bmcbiol.biomedcentral.com/articles/10.1186/s12915-020-0738-1 - now shows multiple evidence of introgression
A newly published article - The wild species genome ancestry of domestic chicken https://bmcbiol.biomedcentral.com/articles/10.1186/s12915-020-0738-1 - now shows divergence time of junglefowl species

/* Breeds (A–Z) */ My Pet Chicken is a biased company who aims to create descriptions that suit their selling needs. A single source for this is not good, and people should look at Wikipedia's descriptions of the individual chickens instead of using this table.

The addition of "very" here is not in keeping with the encyclopedic language of Wikipedia.  Please see [[WP:TONE]] and [[WP:VERY]].
/* As pets */They don’t have to be “tamed” by hand-feeding. They can be “tamed” by raising the, from a chick and giving them love and affection.
The [[Chickens as pets]] article isn’t that pretty right now, for now, let’s just do this.
This is no need for this, as chickens as food are already mentioned in Farming.

/* Use by humans */Combining “As pets” and “Farming” into Use by humans. “Artificial incubation” is a main in Use by humans too, instead of being a subsection of Farming, since they’re not only artificially incubated to be used as livestock.
/* Farming */Free range chickens were already mentioned
/* Nesting and laying behaviour */This is not needed.
/* Broodiness */All breeds lay eggs. Be more specific.
/* Social behaviour */ I reworded this section and added a reference.  I couldn't find any sources describing the warning call chickens make, so I removed that bit of information.
/* Social behaviour */ I added a reference, in place of the citation needed tag.
/* Terminology */stress need not be included for monosyllables using [[Project:AWB|AWB]]
